name: Milk Vita Pasteurized Milk
description:
Milk Vita Pasteurized Milk is fresh, high-quality cow's milk that has been pasteurized to eliminate harmful bacteria, ensuring it is safe to consume. It has a rich, creamy taste and is packed with essential nutrients like calcium, protein, and vitamins, making it a perfect addition to your daily diet. Ingredients: Fresh Cow's Milk, Preservatives (if applicable, based on local regulations). Making Process:Milk Collection: Fresh milk is sourced from healthy cows.Pasteurization: The milk is heated to a specific temperature to kill any harmful bacteria, ensuring safety while preserving the milk's nutrients.Cooling and Packaging: The milk is rapidly cooled and then packaged in sterilized containers to maintain its freshness. Uses: Drinking Tea/Coffee, Cooking & Baking,  Smoothies, A great base for making smoothies or milkshakes. Benefits:Rich in Calcium: Supports bone and teeth health.High in Protein: Essential for muscle growth and repair.Vitamins A & D: Help maintain good vision and immune system function.Fresh & Natural: No artificial additives, providing you with pure, wholesome milk.
Milk Vita Pasteurized Milk is fresh, high-quality cow's milk that has been pasteurized to eliminate harmful bacteria, ensuring it is safe to consume. It has a rich, creamy taste and is packed with essential nutrients like calcium, protein, and vitamins, making it a perfect addition to your daily diet.
 
Ingredients: Fresh Cow's Milk, Preservatives (if applicable, based on local regulations).
 
Making Process:
Milk Collection: Fresh milk is sourced from healthy cows.
Pasteurization: The milk is heated to a specific temperature to kill any harmful bacteria, ensuring safety while preserving the milk's nutrients.
Cooling and Packaging: The milk is rapidly cooled and then packaged in sterilized containers to maintain its freshness.
 
Uses: Drinking Tea/Coffee, Cooking & Baking,  Smoothies, A great base for making smoothies or milkshakes.
 
Benefits:
Rich in Calcium: Supports bone and teeth health.
High in Protein: Essential for muscle growth and repair.
Vitamins A & D: Help maintain good vision and immune system function.
Fresh & Natural: No artificial additives, providing you with pure, wholesome milk.

name: Pran Pasteurized Full Cream Liquid Milk
description:
Pran Pasteurized Full Cream Liquid Milk Pasteurized milk is raw milk. Milk contains a wide array of nutrients, including vitamins, minerals, protein, healthy fats and antioxidants. Keep in mind that its nutritional content can vary depending on many factors. Milk contains a variety of nutrients that benefit bone health, such as calcium, vitamin D, phosphorus and magnesium. Studies suggest that consuming milk and dairy products may prevent osteoporosis and reduce the risk of fractures.

name: Ultra Pasteurized Milk
description:
Ultra Pasteurized Milk is a type of milk that has been heated to a high temperature to kill bacteria and increase its shelf life. Ultra Pasteurized Milk is also known as Ultra-High Temperature (UHT) Milk.

name: Aarong Dairy Strawberry Yogurt Drink UHT Milk
description:
The Aarong Dairy Strawberry Yogurt Drink (UHT) 200 ml is a ready-to-drink yogurt beverage, that combines the sweetness of strawberry flavor with the creamy richness of yogurt. It is made using ultra-heat treatment (UHT) for extended shelf life, ensuring freshness and taste without the need for refrigeration until opened. This drink is an excellent source of probiotics, which support digestion and gut health, and it offers a refreshing option for both kids and adults. Perfect as a snack or on-the-go refreshment, it is designed to cater to health-conscious consumers looking for a flavorful and nutritious treat​.
